1.title: The Sweet Taste of Success
1.plot: The Cowgirls join up for their first ride of the season at the Strawberry Capital of Texas, Poteet. The girls have overcome the challenges of crazy injuries and continue to show they've got the grit to ride broncs.

2.title: Cowgirls and Aliens
2.plot: The cowgirls experience their first PRCA rodeo on the tour, and have an out-of-the-world adventure in the process.

3.title: The Ride of Redemption
3.plot: With two back-to-back rodeos, the girls face the Texas summer heat, visit Nocona TX for the first time, and come to terms with their worst rodeo of last season in Lockhart TX. Will this season bring them redemption?

4.title: Every Ride Counts
4.plot: A life of bronc riding isn't easy, as the girls deal with new injuries and job losses due to their rodeo life.

5.title: Practice Makes Perfect
5.plot: With their focus on Cheyenne, the Cowgirls perfect their rides at the Biggest Little Rodeo in Texas.

6.title: The Big Daddy of Em All
6.plot: The Cowgirls become history makers, as the first female bronc riders to set foot in the arena in 90 years - ending their season with their biggest dream coming true.

1.title: Deep in the Heart of Texas
1.plot: The Cowgirls arrive from all over the country to bring back the long-lost art of female ranch bronc riding in Graham and Poteet TX, with a little rest and celebration along the Riverwalk of San Antonio.

2.title: So Falls Wichita Falls
2.plot: The Cowgirls come together in Wichita Falls TX for their third try at ranch bronc riding. Duke shows the ropes at home with Joe and little Joe; and bucking horse breeder Steve watches his weanlings and colts to see if they have what it takes.

3.title: The Agony of Defeat and Thrill of Victory
3.plot: The Cowgirls quickly learn the riding ranch bronc can be a dangerous sport, and are reminded that these girls are family as they marvel at Billi's close call.

4.title: Tripping in Dripping Springs
4.plot: The Cowgirls meet up in Dripping Springs TX. Rainey shares her loping skills then joins the girls in Gatesville. As they conquer their fears, Duke brushes off another close call.

5.title: A Bastrop Homecoming
5.plot: Brittany and Sarah show their dedication outside of the rodeo, and join the Cowgirls in Bastrop for a Texas-style Homecoming and Rodeo.

6.title: Looking Ahead Through the Past
6.plot: Jane works on bronc riding in Colorado, while the girls come together in Henrietta Texas, and take time to honor the brave cowgirls before them.

7.title: Finals in Glen Rose
7.plot: As the girls wrap up the rodeo season with one final adventure together in Glen Rose Texas, and a chance to celebrate together.

imdb.plot outline: They are tough as nails. They are driven to win. They don't quit. They are...Cowgirls. Join RIDE TV as we follow the women of competitive Ranch Bronc Riding in Texas. A rodeo sport that involves holding on for 8 dangerous seconds on top of a 1,200 pound bucking horse, these women embody the grit and determination that deserves the title of Cowgirl. What has been traditionally a man's sport, Ranch Bronc Riding is now exploding in Texas and women from all over the country are making their way to the Lone Star state.
imdb.title: Cowgirls
plot: They are tough as nails. They are driven to win. They don't quit. They are..._Cowgirls_ (qv). Join RIDE TV as we follow the women of competitive Ranch Bronc Riding in Texas. A rodeo sport that involves holding on for 8 dangerous seconds on top of a 1,200 pound bucking horse, these women embody the grit and determination that deserves the title of Cowgirl. What has been traditionally a man's sport, Ranch Bronc Riding is now exploding in Texas and women from all over the country are making their way to the Lone Star state.
